CD.TITLE: Machado hopes lightning doesn't strike twice in rematch with Cancio
CD.DESCRIPTION: Alberto Machado is determined to put the first loss of his career behind him in a rematch with Andrew Cancio on Friday, and he vows to be better prepared this time to regain his junior lightweight world title.

CD.TITLE: Three things to watch out for in this weekend's Belfast, Glasgow cards
CD.DESCRIPTION: Two huge fight nights are taking place in the United Kingdom this weekend -- both of which are available to be streamed live on ESPN+ in the U.S.

CD.TITLE: Steven Ward vs. Liam Conroy on ESPN+: How to watch
CD.DESCRIPTION: Looking to watch the Steven Ward vs. Liam Conroy light heavyweight bout on ESPN+ on Friday? Here's how to do it.

CD.TITLE: '$60 to get yelled at': Why officiating is nearing a breaking point
CD.DESCRIPTION: I really think technology has done more bad than good at all levels." The world has changed, and it has affected referees from pro to youth sports
